IV.ii.1.A.1.h
.
Reexaminations in Pension Cases
Do not routinely request reexamination in disability pension cases.
Note
:  If a reexamination is scheduled, fully explain the reason for reexamination in the decision narrative.
References
:  For more information on
reexaminations, see
38 CFR 3.327
, and
circumstances in which a review examination may be requested in a pension case, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, 2.B.6.b
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Determining the Need for Review Examinations
